topic.title: 3 Preparation of Transport Route & Installation Equipment

header.para: Preparation of Transport Route & Installation Equipment

body.para: Refer to Installation Manual Chapter 2 Preparation & Installation for sizes of other devices.
Prepare equipment such as the crane, forklift, skates, capable of supporting the size and withstanding the weight on the machine prior to machine transport.
When transport equipment is required, contact Makino service representative for further assistance.
